logic

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a data-class, that stores all necessary information to define a chess-player. It consists of a name, a list of its own pieces and a color-object, that is either black or white.
    Author:
    Moritz Rehschuh
